useCase.name: Content Search
useCase.description: Allow users to search for content using speech input.

preconditions.precondition: User has activated the speech recognition feature.

useCase.trigger: User speaks into the device to initiate a search.

mainSequence.step: Speech Recognition Module processes and converts speech to text.
Content Query Processor receives converted text from Speech Recognition Module.
Content Query Processor queries the Content Database for matching content items.
Content Database returns matched content items to Content Query Processor.
UI interface displays the search results to the user.
UI interface shows search results to the User.
